description: shell on its end with biomorphic organic designs in background; shell has some added elements making it anthropomorphic--appears to be a woman with side-parted long dark hair dancing in a long full skirt
markings: LRC impressed in paper: ESTATE OF / MONICA POOLE
provenance: Private collector, Britain (until 2010; sold to Harvey-Lee); (Elizabeth Harvey-Lee, Aston, Oxfordshire, England, 2010-2017; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-18)
title: Molusc
